title: Task: Set up project structure and dependencies
acceptance_criteria:
- All directories exist with `__init__.py`
- `uv sync` succeeds
- `import requests` works in Python

---
close_reason: Directories created, requests added, .gitignore updated, uv sync OK

title: Task: Implement main.py pipeline orchestrator
acceptance_criteria:
- `uv run python main.py` runs end-to-end without errors
- SQLite DB is created with all tables populated
- ODS file is generated and opens in LibreOffice
- `--skip-download` works with existing DB
- `--download-only` stops after DB population

---
close_reason: main.py with full CLI: download/compute/synthesis/ODS generation

title: Epic: Data pipeline and auditable ODS output
acceptance_criteria:
- `uv run python main.py` downloads data, populates DB, generates ODS
- ODS opens in LibreOffice with all numbers visible
- Every cell in synthesis sheet is a formula referencing a source sheet
- Gas backup total (~114 TWh at 500 GWc) roughly matches original model

---
close_reason: Epic tracked as umbrella; unblocking tasks for implementation

title: Task: Implement SQLite database schema and store
acceptance_criteria:
- `EnergyModelDB("test.db")` creates all tables
- Round-trip: store then load returns same data
- Existing model functions (`besoin_national_chauffage_kw`, etc.) are reused, not reimplemented

---

title: Task: Implement RTE eco2mix downloader
acceptance_criteria:
- `download_rte_production()` returns a 60-row DataFrame
- Data matches expected ranges: nuclear 30-50 GW, hydraulic 5-15 GW
- Cached CSV is written; second call doesn't hit API
- Works offline if cache exists

---

title: Task: Implement PVGIS solar capacity factor downloader
acceptance_criteria:
- `download_pvgis_capacity_factors()` returns 60-row DataFrame
- Summer daytime CFs are ~0.15-0.25; winter nighttime CFs are 0
- CFs decrease with latitude (Lille < Paris < Marseille)
- Cached data is written; works offline if cache exists

---

title: Task: End-to-end verification and validation
acceptance_criteria:
- Pipeline runs without errors
- ODS is fully functional with traceable formulas
- Numbers are in physically plausible ranges
- Parameter changes propagate correctly through formulas
close_reason: Pipeline runs E2E, ODS has 913 formulas in 6 sheets, 326 tests pass, data validates

title: Task: Implement ODS source sheets generation
acceptance_criteria:
- All source sheets have consistent 60-row layout
- Data matches what's in the SQLite database
- Column positions match what the synthesis formulas expect

---

title: Task: Implement ODS writer core with formula support
acceptance_criteria:
- Can create an ODS file with multiple sheets
- Cross-sheet formulas are present in the XML
- Opening in LibreOffice shows formula bar with cross-sheet references
- Pre-computed values display immediately without needing Ctrl+Shift+F9

---

title: Task: Implement synthesis sheet with cross-sheet formulas
acceptance_criteria:
- Click any numeric cell in LibreOffice -> formula bar shows cross-sheet reference
- Change a value in "parametres" sheet -> synthesis recalculates
- Gas total (~114 TWh at 500 GWc) matches original model within 10%
- All 60 data rows present + monthly totals + annual total
- Formula cells have light blue background for visual distinction

---
close_reason: synthesis_sheet.py with 60 formula rows + monthly/annual totals
